description.value: Whenever the dragonspawn ends its turn, any dazing, stunning, or dominating effect on it ends.

On an initiative of 10 + the dragonspawn's initiative check, the dragonspawn can use bite or fiery spittle as a free action. If the dragonspawn cannot use a free action to make this attack due to a dominating or a stunning effect, then that effect ends instead of the dragonspawn making the attack.

Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ poison

Standard

Attack: Melee 2 (one creature)

+19 vs. AC

Hit: 2d6 + 10 damage, and ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

Effect: The dragonspawn uses bite against two different creatures.

At-Will âœ¦ fire

Standard

Attack: Ranged 20 (one creature)

+19 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d8 + 11 fire damage.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ fire, poison

Standard

Attack: Close blast 5 (creatures in the blast)

+17 vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d10 + 11 fire and poison damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Encounter âœ¦ fear

Standard

Attack: Close burst 3 (enemies in the burst)

+17 vs. Will

Hit: The target is dazed until the end of the dragonspawn's next turn.

Aftereffect: The target chooses to either take a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn or take a free action to move its speed away from the dragonspawn.

Miss: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the dragonspawn's next turn.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy within 2 squares of the dragonspawn hits the dragonspawn with a melee attack.

Attack (Immediate Reaction): Melee 2 (triggering enemy)

+19 vs. AC

Hit: 4d6 + 8 damage.

Effect: The dragonspawn flies up to 4 squares. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: The dragonspawn is first bloodied.

Effect (Free Action): Breath weapon recharges, and the dragonspawn uses it.
